ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | drhmsubc.c | |- C = ( U i^i DivRing ) |

| 4 | 3 | #P_rgen | |- A. r e. DivRing r e. Ring |
| 5 | 4, 1, 2 | #P_sringcat | |- ( U e. V -> ( ( RingCat ` U ) |`cat J ) e. Cat ) |
